name: Minotaur's Labyrinth •
description:
Welcome to Knossos in the greek island of Crete. The Minotaur, a half man and half bull beast, is being held in a monumental Labyrinth constructed by the architect Daedalus on orders from King Minos. Escape the wrath and fury of the Minotaur by traversing the Labyrinth without being caught!

• Move through the Labyrinth by tilting your device.

• Collect vases with coins to purchase 5 different Power Ups that can help you on your adventure. Press the screen to select the Power Up you want to use.

• Avoid the Minotaur by hiding in different paths of the Labyrinth. But beware if the Minotaur can see you.

• 48 different levels, with ever more challenging mazes.

• Randomly generated mazes, never the same maze.

• Fun and engaging animations and sound effects.

• Easy and intuitive game play. Fun for all ages.

• Game is saved automatically. Return to saved game or start on the first level.

For any questions or comments please contact us at azul3dapps@gmail.com
